Function template operator<<

boost::log::operator<<

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/log/utility/manipulators/auto_newline.hpp>


template<typename CharT, typename TraitsT, typename AllocatorT> 
  basic_formatting_ostream< CharT, TraitsT, AllocatorT > & 
  operator<<(basic_formatting_ostream< CharT, TraitsT, AllocatorT > & strm, 
             auto_newline_manip);

Description

Stream output operator for the auto_newline manipulator
